package.name: avgfree
package.install:
mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/opt/avg/av/bin mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/lesslinux/blob
install -m 0755 ${PKGNAME}/download-avg.rb ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/lesslinux/blob/ install -m 0644 ${PKGNAME}/avg-free.xml ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/lesslinux/blob/
cat > ${TGTDIR}/opt/avg/av/bin/avgwrapper.sh << EOF #!/bin/bash zenity --info --text 'Please install the AVG free BLOB!' || echo 'Please install the AVG free BLOB!'
EOF chmod 0755 ${TGTDIR}/opt/avg/av/bin/avgwrapper.sh for f in avgcfgctl avgctl avgdiag avgdump avgevtlog \ avgscan avgsetup avgupdate avgvvctl ; do ln -sf /opt/avg/av/bin/avgwrapper.sh ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/${f} done
